### 数据合并
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
msdt <- read_csv("/Users/placenameday/R study/edf_demo/data/processed/eye_tacking/ea/data/ms_inf.csv")

stimdt <- read_csv("/Users/placenameday/R study/edf_demo/data/processed/eye_tacking/ea/data/inner_dt_stim_re.csv")

ndt <- full_join(stimdt, msdt)

write_csv(ndt, "/Users/placenameday/R study/edf_demo/data/processed/eye_tacking/ea/data/inner_dt_stim_re_2.csv")

```
